sub_title: Head of Marketing and Communications, Forma (formerly Spacemaker) at Autodesk, ex-Edelman
summary:
A passionate communications and marketing leader with 16+ years experience in taking international, multi-channel programmes from planning to execution. German by nationality, I worked in Brussels, Beijing, New York, London, Frankfurt and Amsterdam, where I had the pleasure of collaborating with some of the most innovative startups and FTSE 500 companies in the world. 

My experience covers corporate communications, media relations, communications and brand strategy, thought-leadership, executive positioning, crisis preparedness and management, as well as political campaigning and policy development, stakeholder engagement and navigating regulatory environments (EU/US). 

As Head of Marketing, I also successfully built up marketing functions delivering go-to-market strategies that cover content marketing, product marketing, ABM, demand gen as well as product-led marketing strategies. 

My core competency lies in creating compelling messaging and telling stories for brands, their products and services that make the complex accessible, that can change opinions and convert customers. 

To successfully navigate the challenges and opportunities presented by a global marketplace, I believe a communications and marketing strategy needs to be data and insights-driven, and unify a brand's voice across the entire business. 

Full of energy and unafraid to roll up my sleeves, I thrive in fast-paced, high-energy environments. I am a team player and a team leader and am keen on collaborating with organizations that understand meaningful public engagement not only as an integral part of their business strategy but of their success. 

Corporates I have worked for: Microsoft, HP, PayPal, BSH Siemens, GE, Nielsen, Oracle, Symantec, Flex, Hartmann Health, DNV GL, most recently Autodesk

Startups/scale-ups I have worked for: Solar Impulse, Habito, Mesosphere, MessageBird, Globo, Spacemaker

education.degree_name: Digital Marketing, Influencer Marketing, Google Analytics

certifications.name: Hot Yoga and Vinyasa Yoga teacher

profile_positions.description:
Leading breadth of GTM marketing and communications strategy and implementation for Forma (formerly Spacemaker) including product marketing, thought-leadership and content creation , campaign development, PR, analytics with strong KPIs and end user adoption goal.

Leading, managing and growing team plus sizable agency support network, as well as stakeholders (including C-level and EVP level) in Autodesk's matrixed organisation to deliver GTM for Forma

Rebranded from Spacemaker to Forma and developed go-to-market strategy launching Forma globally with 7x adoption within first 4 weeks and month over month, 75 earned media articles in US and EMEA within 2 months.
profile_positions.title: Head of Marketing and Communications, Forma (formerly known as Spacemaker)

profile_positions.description:
Joined as Head of Communications and was promoted to Head of Marketing by founders within 6 months to build the function from the ground up. Member of the executive leadership team of Spacemaker.

Built out to 5-people marketing team plus sizable agency support network within a year covering the full stack to build the Spacemaker brand and generate demand: product marketing, performance marketing, sales enablement, PR and communications, thought-leadership, brand management

Spacemaker was acquired by Autodesk in November 2020, led marketing team through acquisition and integration into Autodesk
profile_positions.title: VP Marketing, Brand and Communications

profile_positions.description:
Advising startups and scale-ups on their brand positioning, communications and marketing

Sample clients:
DNV GL New Energy Ventures (NL/NO) - Instatrust - corporate startup, brand building, advise on UX design, communications and marketing

HABITO (UK) - Series B funded, online mortgage startup - Exec and corporate messaging, communications strategy that supports 2018 business and growth objectives, corporate and regulatory affairs, thought-leadership, product and consumer communications, influencer engagement, 2018 PR budget planning

ONE Recruitment (NL) - leadership recruitment for scaleups - Narrative, message building, brand development and content creation

GLOBO (US based) - translation technology - Message building
profile_positions.title: Advisor Communications, Brand and Content for Startups

profile_positions.description:
Series A $60M, B2B SaaS company, ca. 200 people

•	Built marketing team of 7 during period of scaling and rapid growth, covering web development, content marketing, marketing operations, SEO and event management
•	Lead planning and execution of multi-channel product launch (coverage in relevant industry media, and TechCrunch) 
•	Delivered social media marketing campaigns in EMEA, US, Singapore, Thailand, Hong Kong via LinkedIn and Facebook
•	Delivered marketing strategy and budget for 2019 in cross-functional collaboration with product, sales and customer success team for investor presentation
profile_positions.title: Head of Marketing

profile_positions.description:
Edelman is the world's biggest PR privately owned PR agency, with 66 offices and 6500 staff worldwide. 2016 Global PR agency of the year.

Member of the New York Corporate & Public Affairs practice with focus on integrated, global communications programmes and campaigns, spanning CSR, digital and political communications across multiple markets. 

•	Developed corporate messaging and C-suite positioning programmes for Tata Communications, Flex(tronics), ADT, HCL on impact of tech on society (data security and privacy, IoT, cloud computing, big data, AI)
•	Positioned clients at WEF Davos, DLD, Techonomy, WebSummit, delivered international media engagement
•	Pitched media across the US, and managed the delivery of media outreaches in ES, FR, UK, JP, China, DE, IT, Abu Dhabi
•	Lead global multi-channel campaign for Solar Impulse across 8 markets, delivering influencer and press engagement 
•	Successfully created multi-media content that lead to coverage in NYT, Newsweek, Wired, TIME, Washington Post, Fast Company, CNN, NBC (5,281 broadcast clips, 44,900 pieces online and 770 unique articles)


2015 Edelman Innovative Collaboration Award, Finalist for Solar Impulse (Team Award)

On 6 November 2016, I will run the 2016 TCS NYC Marathon for Doctors Without Borders. As a global citizen, that had the privilege of traveling and living abroad extensively, I believe it is time for me to give back and help an amazing organization continue its global work.
